ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Haste
ygData.msgSnippet: Its typical Verant-speak.  They answer questions like a presidential candidate, don t accept blame, make vague promises, and try not to offend anyone. How
ygData.messageBody:
Its typical Verant-speak. They answer questions like a presidential
candidate, don't accept blame, make vague promises, and try not to offend
anyone.

How could mobs possibly be balanced both before and after a significant
change?

Its like when they gave hybrids all that extra mana. How possibly could
hybrids been balanced on both sides of a significant upgrade?

It never ceases to amaze me that a company that A) makes this much money, B)
is very dependent on good relations with its customers has never bothered to
hire a competent PR person.
